creator: Bitexen Teknoloji A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
Manage your cryptocurrency investments and track the market anywhere, anytime with Bitexen mobile application.

Features include:

- Live order books of BTC/TRY and XRP/TRY markets
- Market information including current prices, 24h volumes and price changes
- Market & Limit Order options
- Tracking account balance
- Tracking order history
- Push notifications about money transfers and executed orders

If you have any questions or support requests, you can send an e-mail to support@bitexen.com

With İnstant Trade screen, you can buy / sell the desired coins in seconds.
You can easily access our analysis of digital coins from the Bulletin menu.
Various performance improvements.

title: Bitexen - Trade Bitcoin and Altcoin

creator: Bitexen Teknoloji A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
Buy and sell cryptocurrencies anytime, anywhere with Bitexen which is the most user-friendly, reliable, fast digital asset trading platform in Turkey and has widest product range including Bitcoin and more than a hundred Altcoins.

Safely buy popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Cardano, NEO, Stellar, Dogecoin, Link and more than a hundred Altcoins.



By keeping BTXN Coin offered by Bitexen in your account, get commission refund every week and have the opportunity to trade with very low commissions.



BUY AND SELL BITCOIN AND ALTCOINS
Open an account at Bitexen to buy and sell cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum and Ripple with Turkish Lira (TRY) or Tether (USDT). Trade in market prices, by limit or stop order types.

DEFI, NFT AND FAN TOKENS
Easily add cryptocurrencies that attract great attention in the world and operate in different areas such as DeFi, NFT and sports clubs to your portfolio.

INSTANT PRICE TRACKING
Instantly monitor the prices of BTC, LTC, NEO, ETH, XRP, XML, ADA, LINK AND more than a hundred cryptocurrencies and digital assets. If you wish, you can see and filter all the trading pairs that you can trade from the Fast Buy-Sell screen without logging into the application.

FAST BUY AND SELL IN OVER 100 ALTCOINS
Fast buy and sell over a hundred cryptocurrencies on 5000+ trading pairs with the Fast Buy & Sell feature.

HIGH SECURITY
With the highest level of system security and 2-Factor Authentication (2FA), your cryptocurrencies and all your data are safe! Bitexen application has successfully passed the tests of the world's famous cyber security company.

FAST MONEY TRANSFER
It is very easy to deposit and withdraw money thanks to Bitexen's integrated system with Turkish Banks. Money transfers made by wire transfer and EFT are in your account in the fastest way!

100% LOCAL SOFTWARE
Digital Asset Trading Platform Bitexen was developed by Bitexen Teknoloji A.Ş., established in Turkey and operates at ITU ARI Teknokent Technology Development Zone, by Turkish engineers.

LATEST NEWS
Follow the most important developments affecting the price movements in Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, stay updated with research articles, analysis and news prepared by the Bitexen Research team.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Bitexen Support team is with you in all your account opening and cryptocurrency transactions. Get 24/7 support from our expert support team whenever you need help.
descriptionShort: User-friendly reliable and lightning-fast Bitcoin and Altcoin Exchange of Turkey

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We continue to develop Bitexen for you;
-Renaming of EXEN Coin to BTXN Coin is completed. EXEN/TRY market is converted to BTXN/TRY.
